attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should rationalise tax. This means we should not have the percentage of tax increase as your wage increases. It should stay at a set amount - 22% has been worked out to be feasible. That is just over half of what you will pay if you earn 35K a year, who pay 40% tax.
We can give a substantial amount less to the government as there will be no need for more money, because we wouldn’t employ people to work out the taxes as they can be simply worked out.
This will still be enough for the government, and will pay for everything that tax pays for now – except for the extra needless taxmen.
This will also save us money on accountants working out our tax. This is a fairer system as we will all pay the same percentage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
